name: Edge 3i
headline: Plaster-up-to invisible loudspeaker
description: Compact plaster-up-to invisible loudspeaker delivering warm Edge-series tonality for smaller rooms and cost-conscious architectural installations.
heroCopy: Compact scale, seamless finish — Edge-series warmth concealed within the architecture.
story: Edge 3i brings the characteristic warmth and natural balance of the Edge series to smaller spaces. Designed for installations with limited cavity depth or tighter stud layouts, it delivers engaging sound while maintaining complete architectural invisibility. Its plaster-up-to design allows it to dissolve seamlessly into walls or ceilings, preserving clean surfaces without visual compromise.
definition: Compact plaster-up-to invisible loudspeaker for architectural audio systems.

lifestyle.caption: A compact plaster-up-to form that disappears into the architecture, allowing sound to quietly fill the space.
An ultra-slim profile designed for shallow cavities and uninterrupted surfaces.

name: Edge 5i
headline: Plaster-up-to invisible loudspeaker
description: Versatile plaster-up-to invisible loudspeaker delivering balanced Edge-series warmth for residential and commercial environments.
heroCopy: Balanced performance, seamless integration — the versatile heart of the Edge range.
story: Edge 5i is the most versatile model in the Edge series, offering a balance of warmth, clarity, and architectural discretion. Its plaster-up-to design ensures flawless integration into finished surfaces, making it suitable for a wide range of residential and commercial applications.
definition: Mid-size plaster-up-to invisible loudspeaker for architectural audio systems.

lifestyle.caption: Balanced proportions allow the panel to merge seamlessly into plastered surfaces.

name: Edge 7i
headline: Flagship plaster-up-to invisible loudspeaker
description: Flagship Edge-series plaster-up-to loudspeaker delivering greater scale, authority, and extended low-frequency reach while remaining completely hidden.
heroCopy: Flagship scale and authority — sound embedded within the structure.
story: Edge 7i represents the pinnacle of the Edge series, delivering increased scale, authority, and low-frequency reach for larger spaces. Designed to remain fully concealed, it integrates seamlessly into plastered surfaces while providing a more immersive and commanding listening experience.
definition: Flagship plaster-up-to invisible loudspeaker for premium architectural audio systems.
applications: Large living rooms and open-plan spaces

lifestyle.caption: Clean junctions emphasise the absence of visible technology while sound fills the room.
Flagship performance refined to disappear seamlessly into plastered surfaces.
